name: CSCustomAttributeKey
desc: A key associated with a custom attribute for a searchable item.

items.name: init?(keyName: String)
items.desc: Returns a new custom attribute key with the specified name.

items.name: init?(keyName: String, searchable: Bool, searchableByDefault: Bool, unique: Bool, multiValued: Bool)
items.desc: Returns a new custom attribute key with the specified name and properties.

items.name: var keyName: String
items.desc: The name of the custom attribute key.

items.name: var isMultiValued: Bool
items.desc: A Boolean value that indicates if the custom attribute is likely to have multiple values, such as arrays, associated with it.

items.name: var isSearchable: Bool
items.desc: A Boolean value that indicates if the custom attribute can be specified as a search term.

items.name: var isSearchableByDefault: Bool
items.desc: A Boolean value that indicates if the custom attribute should be searchable by default.

items.name: var isUnique: Bool
items.desc: A Boolean value that indicates if duplicate custom attribute values should be treated as the same value to save storage space.
